settings.custom_liquid:
<style>
@media (min-width: 1360px) {
    .container-xxl, .shopify-policy__container-xxl, .container-xl, .shopify-policy__container-xl, .container-lg, .shopify-policy__container-lg, .container-md, .shopify-policy__container-md, .container-sm, .shopify-policy__container-sm, .container, .shopify-policy__container {
        max-width: 1450px;
    }
}

@media screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
    .header-wrapper.container .header {
        margin: 3.2rem 0;
border-radius: 4.2rem;
    }
}

.header__icons {
display: none;
}

.button {
border-radius: 4.2rem;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 1760px) {
    .aic--right .aic__info {
margin-left: unset !important;
    }
}

@media screen and (min-width: 1360px) {
    .aic--right .aic__info {
        padding-left: unset;
    }
}

.image-with-text__column {
    flex-direction: row !important;
    column-gap: 10px;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
    .image-with-text__column-icon--recommended .icon {
        font-size: 2.9rem !important;
    }
}

.image-with-text__column-title {
font-weight: 400;
}

.multicolumn-card__image-wrapper--image img {
border-radius: 100%;
}
</style>
